attributes.action: do more to help British Citizen Stefan Beal currently in custody in Spain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A teenager originally from Bedfordshire has been arrested by police in Spain following an alleged sexual assault on a 77-year-old woman.

There are no evidence that suggests Stefan has committed this offence.

Stefan has never been in trouble with the police in the UK or Spain. Ten months after he was arrested, he is still in prison, no bail, no date for a court case, no nothing.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
